li.p:
Defines the action to take when a preferred term is saved and there is no FSN for the concept. The options to be selected are the following:
None: no FSN is generated

ul.li: Same as preferred: generates a FSN in the target language, with the same text as the target preferred term and the translated semantic tag. Translation of the semantic tag hierarchy is a pre-requisite for semantic tag generation.
Copy source language: generates a new description in the target language, with new IDs, identical to the source FSN.
Link source language: includes the source language FSN in the target language refset, as the new FSN, keeping the same identifiers.
